5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abdullah b. Zubair narrated on the authority of his father:When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sat in prayer. he placed the left foot between his thigh and shank and stretched the right foot and placed his left hand on his left knee and placed his right hand on his right thigh, and raised his finger

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ الْجُلُوسِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَكَيْفِيَّةِ وَضْعِ الْيَدَيْنِ عَلَى الْفَخِذَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: The description of the sitting during the prayer, and how the hands are to be placed on the thighs
